short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make YouTube more pleasant to use by removing views, likes, comments and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that hides certain YouTube statistics like view counts, like counts, subscriber counts and more, so you can use the platform without stressing over your performance.
